events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and we will review your materials shortly.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department as a Software Engineer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to handle your application and will be in touch soon.
We completed the initial screening of your application and found your experience relevant to the Software Engineer role requirements.
Thank you for responding promptly to our initial screening questions. Your detailed answers helped us assess your fit for the role.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for May 8th at 2 PM UTC. Please confirm your availability.
The technical interview has been completed successfully. Our team was impressed with your problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 12th at 11 AM UTC. This step will help us discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. The discussion about your career goals and our values was very productive.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. You mentioned that the compensation and growth opportunities meet your expectations.
We are pleased to confirm that you have accepted the job offer. Welcome aboard! We will proceed with the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all necessary documents and training schedules to get you up to speed.
The hire process is now closed successfully. We are thrilled to have you as part of our engineering team and look forward to your contributions.
